verses.sanskrit:
ॐ जयन्ती मङ्गला काली भद्रकाली कपालिनी।
दुर्गा शिवा क्षमा धात्री स्वाहा स्वधा नमोऽस्तु ते॥
verses.transliteration:
oṃ jayantī maṅgalā kālī bhadrakālī kapālinī।
durgā śivā kṣamā dhātrī svāhā svadhā namo'stu te॥
verses.meaning: Om, salutations to You who are Jayanti (victorious), Mangala (auspicious), Kali (dark goddess), Bhadrakali (blessed Kali), Kapalini (bearer of skulls), Durga (invincible), Shiva (auspicious), Kshama (forgiveness), Dhatri (sustainer), Svaha (oblation) and Svadha (offering to ancestors).

verses.sanskrit:
जय त्वं देवि चामुण्डे जय भूतापहारिणि।
जय सर्वगते देवि कालरात्रि नमोऽस्तु ते॥
verses.transliteration:
jaya tvaṃ devi cāmuṇḍe jaya bhūtāpahāriṇi।
jaya sarvagate devi kālarātri namo'stu te॥
verses.meaning: Victory to You, O Goddess Chamunda! Victory to You who remove evil spirits! Victory to You who pervade everything, O Goddess Kalaratri, salutations to You!

verses.sanskrit:
मधुकैटभविध्वंसि विधातृवरदे नमः।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
madhukaiṭabhavavidhvaṃsi vidhātṛvarade namaḥ।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: Salutations to You who destroyed Madhu and Kaitabha, who bestow boons to Brahma. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
महिषासुरनिर्णाशि भक्तानां सुखदे नमः।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
mahiṣāsuranirṇāśi bhaktānāṃ sukhade namaḥ।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: Salutations to You who destroyed Mahishasura, who grant happiness to devotees. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
रक्तबीजवधे देवि चण्डमुण्डविनाशिनि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
raktabījavadhe devi caṇḍamuṇḍavināśini।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O Goddess who slew Raktabija, who destroyed Chanda and Munda. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
शुम्भस्यैव निशुम्भस्य धूम्राक्षस्य च मर्दिनि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
śumbhasyaiva niśumbhasya dhūmrākṣasya ca mardini।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O crusher of Shumbha, Nishumbha and Dhumraksha. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
वन्दिताङ्घ्रियुगे देवि सर्वसौभाग्यदायिनि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
vanditāṅghriyuge devi sarvasaubhāgyadāyini।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O Goddess whose feet are worshipped, who bestow all good fortune. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
अचिन्त्यरूपचरिते सर्वशत्रुविनाशिनि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
acintyarūpacarite sarvaśatruvināśini।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O one of inconceivable form and deeds, destroyer of all enemies. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
नताः स्म नो नतायैव त्वमेव च पराक्रमे।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
natāḥ sma no natāyaiva tvameva ca parākrame।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: We have bowed to You who are ever worthy of salutation, You who are supreme in valor. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
विद्याधीनागरीमन्तसत्वरेमन्तसंयुते।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
vidyādhīnāgarīmantasatvaremantasaṃyute।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O one united with the Vidyadhina, Nagari, and Satvara mantras. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
प्रचण्डदैत्यदर्पघ्ने चण्डिके प्रणताय मे।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
pracaṇḍadaityadarpghne caṇḍike praṇatāya me।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O Chandika, who destroyed the pride of fierce demons, to me who bow before You. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
चतुर्भुजे चतुर्वक्त्रसंस्तुते परमेश्वरि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
caturbhuje caturvaktrasaṃstute parameśvari।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O Supreme Goddess with four arms, praised by Brahma with four faces. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
कृष्णेन संस्तुते देवि शश्वद्भक्त्या सदाम्बिके।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
kṛṣṇena saṃstute devi śaśvadbhaktyā sadāmbike।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O Goddess praised by Krishna with eternal devotion, O eternal Mother. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
हिमाचलसुतानाथसंस्तुत्ये परमेश्वरि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
himācalasutānāthasaṃstutye parameśvari।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O Supreme Goddess praised by the consort of Himalaya's daughter (Lord Shiva). Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
इन्द्राणीपतिसद्भावपूजिते परमेश्वरि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
indrāṇīpatisadbhāvapūjite parameśvari।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O Supreme Goddess worshipped with pure devotion by Indra and his consort. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
देवि प्रचण्डदोर्दण्डदैत्यदर्पविनाशिनि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
devi pracaṇḍadordaṇḍadaityadarpavināśini।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O Goddess who destroyed the pride of demons with fierce and powerful arms. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
प्रचण्डदैत्यदोर्दण्डदर्पनाशनकर्मिणि।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
verses.transliteration:
pracaṇḍadaityadordaṇḍadarpanāśanakarmiṇi।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
verses.meaning: O one who performs the act of destroying the pride and powerful arms of fierce demons. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies.

verses.sanskrit:
त्रैलोक्यस्यखिलान्धारे त्वमेवैक परायणम्।
रूपं देहि जयं देहि यशो देहि द्विषो जहि॥
इति श्रीमार्कण्डेयपुराणे अर्गलास्तोत्रं सम्पूर्णम्॥
verses.transliteration:
trailokyasyakhilāndhāre tvamevaika parāyaṇam।
rūpaṃ dehi jayaṃ dehi yaśo dehi dviṣo jahi॥
iti śrīmārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe argalāstotraṃ sampūrṇam॥
verses.meaning: You alone are the support of all the three worlds, You alone are the supreme refuge. Grant me beauty, grant me victory, grant me fame, and destroy my enemies. Thus ends the Argala Stotram from the Markandeya Purana.
